body_html:
It's actually NumPy that made 3.4 the minimum, but I imagine that will cause some confusion for people that are careless with their pip install commands.

Another alternative would be to change numpy>=1.11.0 to numpy==1.11.0 when python==3.3.
body_text:
It's actually NumPy that made 3.4 the minimum, but I imagine that will cause some confusion for people that are careless with their pip install commands.
Another alternative would be to change numpy>=1.11.0 to numpy==1.11.0 when python==3.3.
body:
It's actually NumPy that made 3.4 the minimum, but I imagine that will cause some confusion for people that are careless with their `pip install` commands.

Another alternative would be to change `numpy>=1.11.0` to `numpy==1.11.0` when `python==3.3`.
